SEARCH
Module sc2002.scmb.grp1.hms
Package repository

Class DoctorRepository

java.lang.Object
repository.DoctorRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChangeSecurityQuestionInterface, checkHaveQuestionsInterface, PasswordChangerInterface, ValidationInterface
public class DoctorRepository extends Object implements ValidationInterface, checkHaveQuestionsInterface, PasswordChangerInterface, ChangeSecurityQuestionInterface
Repository class responsible for handling CRUD operations on Doctor data stored in a CSV file. This class implements several interfaces to support validation, password management, and security questions for doctors.
